title: Were Portland Protesters ‘Kidnapped’ by Federal Officers in Unmarked Vans?
subtitle: The claim surfaced as U.S. President Donald Trump prepared to deploy federal law enforcement agents in Chicago and other cities.
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: Operating under orders from U.S. President Donald Trump in summer 2020, federal agents used unmarked vehicles to "kidnap" Portland protesters and did not identify themselves as law enforcement during the apprehensions.
